name: Horror Pet
description:
Controls: Mouse or Touchscreen

You have come of age, and family tradition dictates that you get your own plant. But it's not any plant...

Click the symbols to perform the ritual that will grow your plant from a small, odd sapling into a terrifying cosmic horror!

Made for the 5th Annual Hawktober Game Jam.

Hint: Be sure to download the growth chart if you want to get all the evolutions.
